  <content>February 19, 2025

\[Client\] Release Notes
------------------------

> **Client Download Method (Other than auto update)**
>
> *   Quark Netdisk: [https://pan.quark.cn/s/fe8bb34c77bc](https://pan.quark.cn/s/fe8bb34c77bc)
> *   Join community: [https://yuanshen.site/docs/community.html](https://yuanshen.site/docs/community.html)
> *   Baidu Netdisk (Access code: KYJG): [https://pan.baidu.com/s/1t\_FRadAiGHGxw1YvvWt0bg](https://pan.baidu.com/s/1t_FRadAiGHGxw1YvvWt0bg)
> *   Chinatelecom Cloud (Access code: exn0): [https://cloud.189.cn/t/YF7Fj2zIRVbi](https://cloud.189.cn/t/YF7Fj2zIRVbi)
> *   Automatic update window does not appear? [https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs-more/?id=102055](https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs-more/?id=102055)

java

    /*
                       _ooOoo_
                      o8888888o
                      88" . "88
                      (| -_- |)
                      O\  =  /O
                   ____/`---'\____
                 .'  \\|     |//  `.
                /  \\|||  :  |||//  \
               /  _||||| -:- |||||-  \
               |   | \\\  -  /// |   |
               | \_|  ''\---/''  |   |
               \  .-\__  `-`  ___/-. /
             ___`. .'  /--.--\  `. . __
          ."" '<  `.___\_<|>_/___.'  >'"".
         | | :  `- \`.;`\ _ /`;.`/ - ` : | |
         \  \ `-.   \_ __\ /__ _/   .-` /  /
    ======`-.____`-.___\_____/___.-`____.-'======
                       `=---='
    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
              May no bug be with you.
    */

> For Hot Update Logs, please check _**[Hot Update Log](https://yuanshen.site/docs/en/blog/IBM6MU)**_.

* * *

Rc1.0.1: 2025-01-15

*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where unable to return to the game via shortcut.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where unable to activate Pinned Window Mode.

Rc1.0.0: 2025-01-14

*   Update engine version to 2021.3.20f1c1.
*   Change base framework, now uses YooAsset + HybridCLR to implement hot-updates for long-term support.
*   Improve overall fluency.
*   Probably add a bunch of bugs.
*   **Notice: This version can not be updated through the updater, please redownload the full package.**

* * *

Beta5.2.4: 2024-12-04

*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause a blank screen when double-clicking on Region Select button.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause the malfunction of Position Tracker after reporting errors when downloading and decompressing.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause a save error so that the program cannot exit.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause the Position Tracker setting to OFF when enabling Position Tracker via shortcut.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause the "Switch Map" text overlaps with the item when searching for items on other maps.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the startup screen scales incorrectly.
*   Add a new option "Show 'found' pin detail on middle click only" (that is "Lock 'Found' Pins").
*   Separate UI scaling from map scaling, and increase the zoom range.
*   Improve displaying/hiding logic of basemap elements when scaling UI.

Beta5.2.3: 2024-12-01

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where refresh time format error may cause item count 0/0.
*   Optimize UI scaling to fit Portrait Mode.
*   Refactor UI scaling logic, now adjusting UI scaling will zoom map elements as well.

Beta5.2.2: 2024-11-24

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where login error may cause item count 0/0.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue in Pin Association where pin abnormally disappears when clicking on other pins after clicking on pins belonging to the same cluster.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause shortcut UI unclickable and animation error.
*   Optimize label color for pins belonging to current layer in Multi-Layered Mode, which is the same as in the game now.
*   Optimize icon style for icons without icon.
*   Add text for Tecoloapan Bay region.

Beta5.2.1: 2024-11-20

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where app can not be used in new environment.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that, in Multi-Region-Selection Mode with Show Items Outside Current Map Mode enabled, focusing on a non-current-map item and deselecting the current map may cause the filter to exclusively display non-current-map items.

Beta5.2: 2024-11-20

*   Update map and resources for version 5.2.
*   Fix an **EPIC** issue that may cause save malfunctions.
*   Fix an **EPIC** issue that may cause Offline Mode malfunctions.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause abnormal sizing in pin popup text boxes.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause audio distortion during login.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that causes island switching failures in the 2.8 Golden Apple Archipelago region.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where deselect items when pin popup is opened may cause pin to be in the topmost layer.
*   Add a secondary confirmation popup before clearing all selected items.
*   Add Item Preset.
*   Add Item Search.
*   Add Multi-Region Mode.
*   Add Show Items Outside Current Map Mode.
*   Add Item Spotlight.
*   Add Item Focus.
*   Add Item Context Menu.
*   Add Right-Click Region to Focus.
*   Add new I18N options for startup screen.
*   Add SFX options for startup screen.
*   Optimize judgement logic for Selected Item panel.
*   Optimize tooltip behavior to only refresh display duration when tooltips with identical content are triggered.
*   Improve performance across all scrollable components.
*   Optimize UI animations for region selection, category selection, and item selection interfaces.
*   Improve scrollable window performance to prevent frame drops no matter how many items being loaded.
*   Optimize data structures to improve operational efficiency.
*   Improve performance by optimizing Garbage Collection (GC) calls.
*   Optimize visual effects performance during map transitions.
*   Optimize camera zooming behavior during UI interactions.
*   Improve Item Progress Bar UI performance.
*   Optimize layout management logic in the settings interface UI.
*   Optimize cave entrance detection logic.
*   Add a bunch of BUG features.

Beta5.0.2: 2024-09-23

*   Fix an **EPIC** issue where Relation Type errors may cause item state refresh failures, resulting in Item Count displays as 413/812.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where Auto Switch Multi-Layered Map may not work.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where Region Filter Sorting may not work properly.
*   New Directional Related, Unidirectional Path, Bidirectional Path type are now available in the Pin Association.
*   Add a new option for Windows Graphics Settings in Position Tracker to facilitate deactivate windowed-game optimization.

Beta5.0.1: 2024-08-28

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where the pin hidden state of some layers might be incorrect.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the DLL version translation may not apply.

Beta5.0: 2024-08-28

*   Update map and resources for version 5.0.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where resource version may be -1.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the scrollbar of the pin popup might not be able to be dragged.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where some text changes might not take effect immediately when switching languages.
*   Optimize I18n language reselection logic.
*   Improve webp format support for images.
*   Improve FX performance when switching item types.

Beta4.8: 2024-07-17

*   Update map and resources for version 4.8.

Beta4.7.2: 2024-06-25

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where deselecting pins may deselect multiple times causing pins to disappear directly.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where cave entrances may be affected by opacity settings when opening for the first time.

Beta4.7.1: 2024-06-17

*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where data read exception may cause item count reports 413/812.

Beta4.7: 2024-06-17

*   Update some basemap text.
*   Fix an **EPIC** issue where the program may not operate after forcing exit and reopening when activating Overlay Mode.
*   Optimize Selected Items panel, now items with the same name will be merged.
*   Optimize I18n language reselection logic.

Beta4.6.3: 2024-05-04

*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where some pin popups may unable to open when activating Auto Switch Multi-Layered Map.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where you may unable to close pin popup by clicking the Close button.

Beta4.6.2: 2024-05-01

*   Update Position Tracker for Sea of Bygone Eras.
*   Update some layered maps.
*   Change some basemap text positions.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where status restoration may restore other items with the same name.
*   Add a **EPIC** feature, Auto Switch Multi-Layered Map. When enabled, clicking on pins will automatically switch to corresponding layer.
*   Add new option "Show Cave Entrances in Multi-Layered Mode" in Settings.
*   Optimize Save Rollback, with the addition of data cleaning and date selection, the program may not get stuck with too much data now
*   Optimize Tooltip, now middle click can also open POI details, so you can check POI details on middle click while editing the canvas

Beta4.6.1: 2024-04-24

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where Dragonspine region may incorrectly displayed as Veluriyam Mirage.

Beta4.6: 2024-04-24

*   Update map and resources for version 4.6.
*   Fix an **EPIC** issue where Position Tracker may not be able to enable when the location tracking version update server crashes.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where SFX may be abnormally stuttering when enabling Position Tracker.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue which may cause data error on very few items.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue which may cause Show Cave Entrances in Multi-Layered Mode malfunctioning.
*   Add a **MYTHICAL** feature, Pin Association. This feature benefits in tracking and selecting pins by connecting pins with relations. Moreover, related settings are added, and pin relations can be auto-triggered once configured.
*   Optimize redirection logic for some web links.
*   Optimize pin rendering behavior at high map zoom levels.

Beta4.4.4: 2024-02-27

*   Fix a **EPIC** issue that may cause Position Tracker download failures.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue which may cause Overlay Mode errors when Graphic Settings are set to Borderless in-game.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue which may cause Run in Offline Mode and Exit button malfunctions after three download failures.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue which may cause Position Tracker update detection error.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue which may cause tooltip text to detach from prompt window.
*   Optimize \[Location Tracker\]'s version selection UI. Moreover, a marker is added to the downloaded version.
*   Optimize UI tips for some long text.

Beta4.4.3: 2024-02-22

*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause a mismatched announcement is displayed when clicking an announcement.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause a resetting failure in opened but hidden pins.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause items with item count 0/0 not to display.
*   Add a control slider for Opacity of "Found" Pins.
*   Add a option for switching the state of The Tower of Ipsissimus.
*   Add a control slider for Opacity of Hidden Teleport Waypoints.
*   Add text for layered map in Chenyu Vale region.
*   Add shortcut settings for switching Multi-Layered Mode and Show/Hide "Found" pins (setting to "None" by default).
*   Add chest collection progress bar.
*   Add focus tooltips for most scrollbar controls.
*   Optimize Announcement interface, an entry is added, and supports hyperlinks now.
*   Optimize font texture for clearer display.
*   Optimize pin popup by attaching images externally. Moreover, text scrolling logic is enhanced and text can be dragged by left-click.

Beta4.4.2: 2024-01-31

*   Update map and resources for version 4.4.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause data update exception.

Beta4.4.1: 2024-01-31

*   Update map and resources for version 4.4.

Beta4.4: 2024-01-31

*   Update map and resources for version 4.4.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause other pins with the corresponding ID to not be selected simultaneously after selecting a Teleport Waypoint.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue which selected Teleport Waypoints may not be properly transparentized when enabling Multi-Layered Mode.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause accidental Teleport Waypoint activation when clicking on pins.
*   Optimize selecting status of Teleport Waypoints.
*   Optimize display behavior for overlength pin titles.
*   Optimize display behavior of overlength text in pin popups.
*   Add Announcement system.

Beta4.2: 2023-11-08

*   Update map and resources for version 4.2.
*   Fix a **EPIC** issue that may cause the item selection state to not be correctly restored during login/logout. And when Multi-Layered Mode is enabled, the Cave Entrance will automatically display upon restarting the map after deactivating "Show Cave Entrances in Multi-Layered Mode".

Beta4.1.2: 2023-10-20

*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause the application stuck during data updates.

Beta4.1.1: 2023-10-12

*   Optimize the size scaling of the layer switch button.
*   Optimize filtering logic of underground area pins, allowing pins to be filtered based on underground levels.
*   Improve version switching logic of Position Tracker.

Beta4.1: 2023-09-27

*   Update map and resources for version 4.1.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause text overflow in certain languages in Settings.

Beta4.0.2: 2023-09-12

*   Backend update to support the new version. Older versions will no longer be supported.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause image misalignment of Mountain Cavern: F2.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the Waverider Waypoint in Fontaine may be missing.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause two layered maps to be in the incorrect underground layer in Dharma Forest.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause certain pins to immediately refresh after being selected. (uncertain whether it is fully resolved)

Beta4.0.1: 2023-08-18

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where certain items may not show or hide properly .
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause abnormal refresh time for mineral pins.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where two Fontaine region may appear simultaneously on the map.

Beta4.0: 2023-08-16

*   Update map and resources for version 4.0.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue: When restart the Map after selecting an item containing both Chest and other items, deselecting one of these items may cause this item can not be reselected.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause abnormal visibility of Cave Entrances.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause abnormal refresh time for mineral pins.

Beta3.8.1: 2023-07-08

*   Update Position Tracker for 3.8.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause the data update speed to freeze at 0 kB/s.
*   Add an auto-save prompt when exiting the Map.

Beta3.8: 2023-07-04

*   Update map and resources for version 3.8.

Beta3.6.4: 2023-04-18

*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause Japanese place names to display incorrectly.

Beta3.6.3: 2023-04-17

*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause inherent pin interactions to block higher-level pins.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may prevent returning to the game via shortcuts when the game is running in Fullscreen Mode.

Beta3.6.2: 2023-04-16

*   Fix a **EPIC** issue that may cause the mouse not to be captured by the game when returning to the game in Overlay Mode.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where map may not disappear properly in Overlay Mode.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where some Teleport Waypoints may incorrectly appear in other maps after data update.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where data update popup may not close properly after data update.
*   Optimize the hotfix resource download logic to significantly reduce the size of subsequent update packages.
*   Add an option for the return-to-game shortcut configuration in Settings.

Beta3.6.1: 2023-04-15

*   Update Layered Map of Girdle of the Sands and some Layered Map of Dharma Forest.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause some item counts to display unusual values (e.g., 413/812) when not logged in.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause the map to switch to non-fullscreen mode after exiting and re-opening the map in Fullscreen Mode.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause the text of Vourukasha Oasis not to display.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the \[Tugini Hollow\] layer not to display as the final version.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause a series of pre-existing and post-issues in Overlay Mode.
*   Remove Auto Oculus.
*   Add an option to clear the tracking cache.

Beta3.6: 2023-04-12

*   Update map and resources for Girdle of the Sands.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause border effect incorrectly displays in non-Teyvat areas.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the boundary effects may be in the incorrect layer when switching areas.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where other items in Chest category can not be deselected after selection.
*   Optimize touch screen adaptation.
*   Change application icon.
*   Update installer.

Beta3.5: 2023-03-06

*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause the opacity of underground and aboveground pins to not switch properly after data update.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where the font outline of base map may not render properly.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the status of Teleport Waypoints may not be saved.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where download progress may reset during re-downloading after closing the Position Tracker download window.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause abnormal animation behavior when re-completing download after clearing the download cache.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue: When exit and re-open Map during data download, data may display as a negative number when a re-download starts.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause the oculus popup window to be larger than others.
*   Optimize the reset logic for filter options.
*   Improve shader performance for boundary effects.

Beta3.4.10: 2023-02-14

*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause Canvas malfunctions, leading to a series of related UI anomalies.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause some map text to be obscured by the base map.
*   Optimize the minimum opacity of pins.
*   Optimize the shortcut key tips for Overlay Mode.
*   Optimize pin opacity slider.
*   Optimize the slider interaction logic, now allowing input values manually.
*   Add a confirmation popup before opening the webpage.

Beta3.4.9: 2023-02-12

*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause abnormal UI scaling of pins after data update.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause some map text to be obscured by the base map.

Beta3.4.8: 2023-02-12

*   Fix a **LEGENDARY** issue that may cause UI interactions to freeze.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause data updates to fail.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause Teleport Waypoints to be hidden after selecting, due to the "Hide 'Found' Pins" option being enabled.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where selecting Teleport Waypoints after enabling "Hide 'Found' Pins" may cause them to be hidden.

Beta3.4.7: 2023-02-11

*   Fix a **LEGENDARY** issue that may cause severe lag if the popup is closed before the image finishes loading when clicking on a pin (not fully fixed, might be resolved in next update).
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where the Teleport Waypoint popup may not be able to open.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where Unusual Hilichurl may have refresh time.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where Map may unable to exit when the network connection is poor.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where unable to select other map areas after deactivating Easter Egg Mode in Golden Apple Archipelago Region.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where show/hide status of Teleport Waypoints may be incorrect during initialization.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where popup text may be incomplete while the image is loading.
*   Add Auto Reset Refreshable Pins.
*   Reduce delay when selecting a pin, now the selection will complete instantly, even if you are disconnected from the server.

Beta3.4.6: 2023-02-10

*   Fix a **LEGENDARY** issue that may cause severe lag after running for a period of time (not fully fixed, might be resolved in next update).
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where pin status may not refresh when switching saves.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue which may unable to scroll down when there are more than 6 saves.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause the program to freeze when exiting after the Position Tracker module is loaded.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where Camera Lock may still work when it is deactivated.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where popup text may incompletely displayed when loading image (not fully fixed, might be resolved in next update).
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where Cave Entrances in Sumeru may display incorrectly when enabling Multi-Layered Mode in other map areas.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the "Delete Canvas" button may act as duplicate in non-Chinese languages.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where item filter may automatically fold when switching areas in Auto-Expand Mode.
*   Add Save Rollback, with independent rollback for cloud and local saves.
*   Add draggable UI.
*   Add Show All Layers in Multi-Layered Mode.
*   Add a new option to unbind shortcuts.
*   Add an option to clear download cache of Position Tracker.
*   Add a marker for downloaded version of Position Tracker.
*   Optimize scaling logic for all popup UIs.
*   Optimize the switching smoothness of Layered Maps and selected pins.
*   Improve rendering efficiency.

Beta3.4.5: 2023-01-30

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where some items may display incorrectly when first rendered.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where some items' filter types may not be repeatable.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where translation of Reset Pin button may not apply.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where unable to change display mode.
*   Refactor the Position Tracker loading method, now it will update independently.
*   The Position Tracker module now allows version selection.
*   Remove Position Tracker module from the package, significantly reducing the package size.
*   Optimize the version detection logic, now will check the version before downloading resources.

Beta3.4.4: 2023-01-29

*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where unable to deselect some items.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the auto-update path may be incorrect.

Beta3.4.3: 2023-01-29

*   **This version has an issue with automatic updates. Please update the version manually!**
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where underground pins in certain regions may not display underground marker.

Beta3.4.2: 2023-01-28

*   **This version has an issue with automatic updates. Please update the version manually!**
*   Update the independent auto-update for Position Tracker (Postponed).
*   Update Layered Map for Desert of Hadramaveth (Thanks to "Teyvat Map Institute" for providing Layered Map of underground areas)
*   Update DLL of Location Tracker.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where Teleport Waypoints may display abnormally after data update.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where icon may display as \[?\].
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause incorrect scaling of Teleport Waypoints when scaling UI.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where text of Safhe Shatranj may display abnormally.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause a failure in loading save, or save corruption when failed to edit saves.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause incorrect aboveground or underground state display for certain pins.
*   Add fullscreen/windowed mode and a bunch of resolution settings (currently unusable due to a bug, will be fixed in the next version).
*   Optimize the width of sub-region selection buttons to 4 Chinese characters.
*   Optimize the item reset logic, now will no longer reset one-time pins.
*   Add opacity configuration options for both aboveground and underground pins.
*   Add options to toggle show/hide cave entrances in Multi-Layered Mode.

Beta3.4.1: 2023-01-22

*   Update Position Tracker for Desert of Hadramaveth.
*   Optimize visual performance of underground pins in Desert of Hadramaveth.
*   Fix an **EPIC** issue where pin counts may display as negative numbers.

Beta3.4: 2023-01-18

*   Update map and resources for Desert of Hadramaveth.
*   Fix an **EPIC** issue that may cause panel data to fail refreshing, leading to item counts like 413/812. Errors will now directly prompt an alert.
*   Fix an **EPIC** issue where data refresh error may cause item count displays as 413/812. Now it will directly throw out a prompt when an error occurs.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where Waverider Anchors in Sumeru may not display.
*   Further optimize the UI scaling logic, making UI scaling more reasonable now.
*   Optimize the hot update resource download, now you can clear and redownload resources.
*   Improve visual performance for underground pins, now they have special markers (this also applies to all regions, including Inazuma).
*   Optimize the texture of the zooming bar, making it a lot more clearer.
*   Optimize the visual style of the settings button in the bottom-right corner to match the in-game design.
*   Update Settings interface, adding numerous new options, paths, and shortcuts. For detailed content, please check the settings by clicking the top-right corner after the update.
*   Update the Position Tracker, now supporting Genshin Impact · Cloud. (Maybe)

Beta3.3: 2022-12-30

*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause save data to be corrupted. Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause the filter can not update pin data when exiting the program without saving data locally.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may prevent deselecting an item in other types when multiple item types are selected simultaneously.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause teleport waypoints to appear incorrectly in the Lore.
*   Optimize the UI scaling logic, now the UI scaling is more reasonable. (Though it's still hard to see the panel clearly on very low resolutions)
*   Update the Position Tracker, now supporting Genshin Impact · Cloud (stability tests not passed yet, waiting for the next update).
*   Optimize the height of the chest filter bar, now the chest category default displays 3 rows.
*   Improve icon resolution.
*   Add DLL version display for Position Tracker.

Beta3.1.4: 2022-10-07

*   Fix a **LEGENDARY** issue where continuous error with Position Tracker may cause the program to crash.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue again where the failure of pin data decompression may cause failed to enter level.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where the Overlay Mode shortcut initialization may become something strange.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue again where time calculation error that caused incorrect time calculation during automatic saving of waypoint data.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue again where time calculation may be incorrect during auto-saving pin data.
*   Update Layered Map for Desert of Hadramaveth again.
*   Optimized the range of Camera Lock. Now the camera will move only when the character has moved a certain distance.
*   Optimized the interaction logic of underground areas in desert areas of Sumeru.
*   Optimized the pin ID position and title length of pin popup.

Beta3.1.3: 2022-10-06

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where pin data extraction error may cause unable to enter level.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where pins can not be reset when they are not displayed.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause incorrect auto-save progress display on exit (does not affect progress actually).
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause the Position Tracker icon to appear abnormally small.
*   Update underground areas of desert areas of Sumeru.
*   Add Pinned Window.
*   Add customized shortcut for Overlay Mode.
*   Optimize the display layer of the Oculus, so they won't be covered by other pins.
*   Optimize the size of the Oculus, now it's much larger.
*   Fix multiple errors with the Position Tracker, though there are still some issues with it in Controller Mode.

Beta3.1.2: 2022-10-05

*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the map may stop moving immediately if the mouse leaves the window before the movement is fully completed.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause incorrect status when showing or hiding pins.
*   Update Position Tracker for Controller Mode and reduce crashes during tracking.
*   Add an "Folded" option to item filter panel, now clicking on it will cycle through three states. And we also optimize the toggle descriptions.
*   Optimize the data update logic, now it will update silently and load manually.
*   Optimize the data storage format for faster download speeds and update times.
*   Fix an issue where selecting pins may have a delay, now the maximum delay will be no more than 1 second.
*   Fix the issue where pressing Alt+M may cause the mouse to click on the desktop. (uncertain about whether it has been fixed)

Beta3.1.1: 2022-10-01

*   Update Position Tracker for Great Red Sand.
*   Update Layered Map for Great Red Sand.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause save failure after data update.
*   Add a new mode to the Position Tracker to address positioning failures.
*   Improve the accuracy of the Position Tracker.
*   Optimize the bottom-right settings, now they can be collapsed.
*   Add Auto Oculus
*   Add Camera Lock

Beta3.1: 2022-09-28

*   Update map and resources for Great Red Sand.
*   Update Layered Map for Great Red Sand.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the initial state of underground areas may be abnormal.
*   Optimize the screenshot logic, only the selected region will be captured now to reduce performance overhead.

Beta3.0.2: 2022-09-06

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where the size of arrow may be incorrect after zooming when it is outside of the tracking area.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause Auto Save may not copy the local save when first logged in. Now, when creating a new save, it will ask whether to copy save from the local save or not before logging in.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where certain devices may unable to use Position Tracker (fixed, if it still doesn't work, try updating your graphics drivers and restarting the map client).
*   Optimize the Position Tracker, now it supports 2560×1080 ultrawide monitors.
*   Optimize the readability of description text of the option "Hide 'Found' Pins".
*   Optimize the scrolling speed of scrollbar.

Beta3.0.1: 2022-09-02

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where the jump button outside the auto-tracking area may display incorrectly.
*   Add a option to toggle Layered Map. (Thanks to "Teyvat Map Institute" for providing Layered Map of underground areas)
*   Update Position Tracker for all regions including Sumeru, The Chasm · Underground Mines and Enkanomiya! (only tested the performance at 1920×1080 resolution)
*   Optimize cooldown of cancelling data update, now the interval will increase exponentially.
*   Optimize the readability of the popup text when overwriting saves.

Beta3.0: 2022-08-24

*   Update map and resources for Dharma Forest.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where unable to select pins after data update.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where item count may incorrect.
*   Pin descriptions are now available for Teleport Waypoint.

!!:::

Beta2.9: Postponed…\*\*

Beta2.8: 2022-07-23

*   **Warning!** Previous versions may unable to update to this version automatically. If you encounter this issue, please manually download the update package!
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where item information may not synchronized when switching from the web version to the client.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause Map Screenshot malfunctions.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where auto-update may not work.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where data update may not update images and texts.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where certain translations may not apply.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where pin video button may disappear.
*   Optimize the pin ID information storage, now use the new ID.
*   Turn a mysterious bug into a new feature, popups can now be scaled by scroll wheel!

Beta2.7.5: 2022-07-20

*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause item selection error when updating data while switching to other maps without selecting any item after launching Map.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where item count may not decrease after pin auto-refresh.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause translation errors when switching regions and languages after data update.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where data update may unable to update new items.
*   Optimize the selection effects for the four islands in the Golden Apple Archipelago region.
*   Add tooltip for island switching in the Golden Apple Archipelago region.
*   Add tooltips for pins that are not in the correct island state.
*   **This version is unable to automatically update due to some issues. Please update manually!** This issue does not affect those who updates automatically from version 2.7.3 or earlier, nor those using overwrite installation.

Beta2.7.4: 2022-07-19

*   Fix a **EPIC** issue where pins may appear in incorrect locations on operating systems with different language settings.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where certain pins may not display due to network issues in the Golden Apple Archipelago region.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where the program may freeze after data update (same as in version 2.7.2, but triggered in a different circumstance).
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the base map text in Japanese may appear as a white box.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause translation errors after switching region.
*   Optimize the data download logic, now it will retry up to 5 times.
*   **This version is unable to automatically update due to some issues. Please update manually!** This issue does not affect those who update automatically from version 2.7.3 or earlier, nor those using overwrite installation.

Beta2.7.3: 2022-07-17

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where updating data without switching maps after startup may cause item selection error
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where the program may freeze after data update.

Beta2.7.2: 2022-07-16

*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause treasure chests not to highlight when switching island forms first and then filtering for chests.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where chests may not highlight when selecting chests after switching island forms for the first time.
*   Revert Position Tracker DLL to previous version. Will be updated again after tests are completed.

Beta2.7.1: 2022-07-15

*   Addressed a bunch of issues.

Beta2.7: 2022-07-15

*   Update map and resources for Golden Apple Archipelago region.
*   Refactor code logic.
*   Addressed a bunch of issues.
*   Add various of new features.
*   Significantly optimize the program's smoothness, now it runs smoothly even at full load.
*   Improve backend efficiency, now the program won't consume much GPU even when running in the background with Background Suspension disabled.
*   Attempted to fix the C++ error in the Position Tracker.
*   "Methods" and "Quality" of chests can be selected simultaneously.
*   Dragonspine is now split off from Mondstadt as a new region.
*   Certain pins is now related to multiple items, selecting one will select all.
*   Increase the startup speed by 200%! Pin loading speed is now 1000% faster, completing in an instant!
*   Add a new feature that may encounter Geo purgatory while launching Map.
*   Add a bunch of issues.

Beta2.6.1: 2022-04-03

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where the region selection may be unavailable when opening the client for the first time.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause auto-update malfunctions.
*   Increase the client request limit to 2 million.

Beta2.6: 2022-03-11

*   Add unexpected new features to the code.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause an initialization error when double-clicking "Click to Enter". (not fixed yet, but will definitely be fixed next time (well, actually it's fixed now; if not, please run the updater to update manually))
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where a continuos "Failed to obtain server version" state may prevent entry. Now, clicking on "Retry" will switch resource server and try again.
*   Known a **RARE** issue that prevents this version from running auto-update. Please update manually.

Beta2.5: 2022-02-16

*   Update map and resources for Three Realms Gateway Offering.
*   Update Position Tracker for Tsurumi Island.
*   Add resource hot update logic (Also introduced numerous unknown issues)
*   Fix an issue where saves may be overwritten. (maybe)
*   Optimize the image resource display mode.
*   Optimize loading page.
*   Make minor adjustments to some UI elements.

Beta2.4: 2022-01-05

*   Update map and resources for Enkanomiya.
*   Add Map Screenshot.
*   Add numerous tooltips and a toggle for displaying tooltips.
*   Improve Canvas operation experience by adding canvas editing interface.
*   Fix a **EPIC** issue where certain line segments may disappear after completing route drawing and relaunching Map.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where abnormal filter restoration may cause an operation lag.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where deleting anchors may cause anomalies when using Canvas.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may trigger incorrect log outputs when drawing lines on the Canvas.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause error log outputs of line segments of the Canvas.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where "Add Canvas" text may not display.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may inadvertently mark pins upon releasing Ctrl + RMB during Batch Selection.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where Random Event and World Quest pins may display abnormally in Mondstadt.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the map may fail to load under certain circumstances.
*   Optimize the effect where clicking on an empty map, now it won't generate an unclear click box.
*   Optimize line drawing feature, now clicking on a POI pin while editing a line segment will pass the POI coordinates into the line.
*   Optimize the display of selected items, now the delete icon only appears when hovering over them.
*   Optimize the size of the region selection buttons to make them easier to click.
*   Optimize translation system, now translations will be updated automatically.
*   Optimize map resources to improve fluency.
*   Add translation coverage to the language selection.

Beta2.3: Postponed…

Beta2.2: 2021-10-13

*   Update map and resources for Tsurumi Island.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause font errors on Esperanto.

Beta2.1.3: 2021-09-10

*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the program may unable to restore from the system tray when it is minimized.
*   Optimize map data update logic, now a popup will automatically appear when data updates are detected.
*   Optimize the filter auto-expand logic, now it will automatically collapse after a period of time when the mouse leaves the program.
*   Optimize the region selection logic, so the issue which unable to find Watatsumi Island, Seirai Island should no longer reoccur.
*   Optimize popup style when update fails, making it more elegant.

Beta2.1.2: 2021-09-03

*   Update Position Tracker for Watatsumi Island, Seirai Island.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue where a small floating window may appear when switching applications by using Alt+Tab.
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause the floating window to flicker erratically, and the map may reopen unexpectedly after a certain period when it is closed by using Alt+M.
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause the pin popup to be penetrated while viewing guide videos, allowing user to interact with pins underneath.</content>
</page>

【Client】CHANGELOG
-----------------

> **Client Download Method (Other than automatic update)**
>
> *   Quark Netdisk: [https://pan.quark.cn/s/fe8bb34c77bc](https://pan.quark.cn/s/fe8bb34c77bc)
> *   Join community: [https://yuanshen.site/docs/community.html](https://yuanshen.site/docs/community.html)
> *   Baidu Netdisk (Key: KYJG): [https://pan.baidu.com/s/1t\_FRadAiGHGxw1YvvWt0bg](https://pan.baidu.com/s/1t_FRadAiGHGxw1YvvWt0bg)
> *   Chinatelecom Cloud（Access code：exn0）：[https://cloud.189.cn/t/YF7Fj2zIRVbi](https://cloud.189.cn/t/YF7Fj2zIRVbi)
> *   Automatic update window does not appear? [https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs-more/?id=102055](https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs-more/?id=102055)

**Rc1.0.1: 2025-01-15**

*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where unable to return to the game via shortcut
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where unable to activate Pinned Window Mode

**Rc1.0.0: 2025-01-14**

*   Update engine version to 2021.3.20f1c1
*   Change base framework, now uses YooAsset+HybridCLR to implement hot-updates for long-term support
*   Improve overall fluency
*   Probably add a bunch of bugs
*   **Notice: This version can not be updated through the updater, please redownload the full package.**

* * *

**beta5.2.4: 2024-12-4**

*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause a blank screen where double-clicking on Region Select button
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause the malfunction of Location Tracker after reporting errors when downloading and decompressing
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause a save error so that the program cannot exit
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause the Location Tracker setting to OFF when enabling Location Tracker via shortcut
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause the "Switch Map Display" text overlaps with the item when searching for items on other maps
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where the startup screen scales incorrectly
*   Marker Settings has a new option "Show 'Found' pin detail only when pressing MMB" (that is "Lock 'Found' Pins")
*   Separate UI scaling from map scaling, and increase the zoom range
*   Improve displaying/hiding logic of base map elements when scaling UI

**beta5.2.3: 2024-12-1**

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where refresh time format error may cause item count 0/0
*   UI scaling optimizations to fit Portrait Screen
*   Refactor UI scaling logic, now adjusting UI scaling will zoom map elements as well

**beta5.2.2: 2024-11-24**

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where login error may cause item count 0/0
*   Fix a **RARE** issue in Pin Wizard where pin abnormally disappears when clicking on other pins after clicking on pin belonging to the same group
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause shortcut UI unclickable and animation error
*   Label color optimizations for pins belonging to current layer in Multi-Layered Mode, which is now the same as in the game
*   Icon style optimizations on icons without icon
*   Add text for Tecoloapan Bay area

**beta5.2.1: 2024-11-20**

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where app can not be used in new environment
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue in "Multi-Region-Selection Mode" and "Show Items Not Belonging to Current Map" Mode that may cause the filter be filled up with non-current map items while focusing on non-current map items and deselecting the current map

**beta5.2: 2024-11-20**

*   Update 5.2 map and resources
*   Fix an **EPIC** issue that may cause save malfunctioning
*   Fix an **EPIC** issue that may cause Offline Mode malfunctioning
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause the size of textbox of the pin popup abnormal
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause log-in SFX playing unexpectedly
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause island switching function malfunctioning in 2.8 Golden Apple Archipelago area
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where deselecting items while pin popup opened may cause pin to be in the topmost layer
*   Add a secondary confirmation popup before clearing all selected items
*   Item Preset
*   Item Search
*   Multi-Region-Selection
*   Show Items Not Belonging to Current Map
*   Item Spotlight
*   Item Focus
*   Item Context Menu
*   Right-Click Region to Focus
*   I18N options for startup screen
*   SFX options for startup screen
*   Judgement logic optimizations on Selected Item List
*   Mouse Prompt optimizations, now only refresh the prompt duration if the mouse prompts are the same
*   Execution efficiency optimizations on scrolling components
*   UI animation optimizations on region selection, item type selection and item selection
*   Window scrolling efficiency optimizations, now it will not get stuck no matter how many items being selected
*   Data structure optimizations to improve efficiency
*   Garbage Collection (GC) call optimizations to improve efficiency
*   FX performance optimizations
*   Camera scaling optimizations when clicking on UI
*   Item Progress Bar UI performance optimizations
*   Settings UI logic optimizations
*   Cave judgement logic optimizations
*   A bunch of BUG features</content>
</page>

*   Improve overall fluency
*   Probably add a bunch of bugs

**beta5.2.4: 2024-12-4**

*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause a blank screen where double-clicking on Region Select button
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause the malfunction of Location Tracker after reporting errors when downloading and decompressing
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause a save error so that the program cannot exit

**beta5.2.2: 2024-11-24**

*   Fix a **RARE** issue in Pin Wizard where pin abnormally disappears when clicking on other pins after clicking on pin belonging to the same group
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause shortcut UI unclickable and animation error

**beta5.2.1: 2024-11-20**

*   Fix a **RARE** issue where app can not be used in new environment
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue in "Multi-Region-Selection Mode" and "Show Items Not Belonging to Current Map" Mode that may cause the filter be filled up with non-current map items while focusing on non-current map items and deselecting the current map

**beta5.2: 2024-11-20**

*   Update 5.2 map and resources
*   Fix an **EPIC** issue that may cause save malfunctioning
*   Fix an **EPIC** issue that may cause Offline Mode malfunctioning
*   Fix a **RARE** issue that may cause the size of textbox of the pin popup abnormal
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause log-in SFX playing unexpectedly
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue that may cause island switching function malfunctioning in 2.8 Golden Apple Archipelago area
*   Fix a **NORMAL** issue where deselecting items while pin popup opened may cause pin to be in the topmost layer
*   Add a secondary confirmation popup before clearing all selected items
*   Item Preset
*   Item Search
*   Multi-Region-Selection
*   Show Items Not Belonging to Current Map
*   Item Spotlight
*   Item Focus
*   Item Context Menu
*   Right-Click Region to Focus
*   I18N options for startup screen
*   SFX options for startup screen
*   Judgement logic optimizations on Selected Item List
*   Mouse Prompt optimizations, now only refresh the prompt duration if the mouse prompts are the same
*   Execution efficiency optimizations on scrolling components
*   UI animation optimizations on region selection, item type selection and item selection
*   Window scrolling efficiency optimizations, now it will not get stuck no matter how many items being selected
*   Data structure optimizations to improve efficiency
*   Garbage Collection (GC) call optimizations to improve efficiency
*   FX performance optimizations
*   Camera scaling optimizations when clicking on UI
*   Item Progress Bar UI performance optimizations
*   Settings UI logic optimizations
*   Cave judgement logic optimizations
*   A bunch of BUG features</content>
</page>

<page>
  <title>加入社区 | 空荧酒馆GitHubXYouTubeBilibiliRedditGitee</title>
  <url>https://yuanshen.site/docs/community.html</url>
  <content>请勿重复加群，由于群人数均衡原因，若重复加群将踢出“群人数较多的群”！</content>
</page>

  <content>**Hi，这里是原神地图网页版的更新日志(o゜▽゜)o☆**

**如果你喜欢这个地图，可以[捐助](https://yuanshen.site/docs/support-us.html)[我们](https://yuanshen.site/docs/support-us.html)~**

**💊BUG修复：**

**📅 8月15日**

**💊BUG修复：**

修复 主页存档无法切换问题（[#162909935810000096](https://support.qq.com/products/321980/post/162909935810000096/)）

**📅 8月14日**

**💊BUG修复：**

新增 主页的页脚中更新日志跳转链接

**📌安全优化：**

新增 内容安全策略( CSP )

**💪功能优化：**

删除 地图缩放按钮

**📅 8月3日**

**💪功能优化：**

**📅 7月28日**

**💪功能优化：**

新增 下载页百度网盘提取码的一键复制

新增 对 IE 浏览器及 JavaScript 文件加载失败的情况设计了全新的错误提示页面

增强 文档的浏览器兼容性

增强 文档的夜间模式的适配

**📅 7月26日**

**💪功能优化：**

**💊BUG修复：**

修复 地图筛选器的聚合问题

**📅 7月6日**

**💊BUG修复：**

关闭 日语页面开页弹窗

*   新增自动Polyfill, 和日志导出功能

*   增加了开关记忆

**5 月 15 日**

*   增加了错误页面, 不兼容的浏览器将直接跳转到错误页面

**4 月 30 日**

**4 月 1 日**

_**【2020年地图网页版更新内容】**_ [​](#【2020年地图网页版更新内容】)
---------------------------------------------

12/26

*   更新雪山玉髓、宝箱点位及图片，重置了玉髓、宝箱图标

12/24

*   更新1.2版本地图，添加雪山部分玉髓、宝箱、冷冻肉、星银矿石

11/20

*   更新一些点位信息，修复了一些点位错误

11/17

*   更新了星陨碎片点位

11/16

*   更新了泥鳅、笋点位

11/13

*   更新了大伟丘点位
*   添加了一大波点位

11/11

*   优化了自动保存逻辑，修复了一些可能的bug

11/10

*   实装了云存档登录系统（基于Gitee-Gist），实装了物品自动刷新，您再也不需要手动取消标记了！

10/20

*   修复跳转问题，修正一些点位错误

10/19

*   站点更新，登录系统预备更新

10/14

*   更新并提交了部分食材、炼金物品，修改了部分宝箱的描述。

10/08

*   优化了代码
*   更新了字体样式
*   无聚合版本更新

10/06

*   更新了部分点位信息，新增了一些新种类及新物品
*   优化了神瞳样式
*   优化了点击弹出框的样式
*   优化了聚合样式，现在聚合完成度更清晰了

10/03

*   更新了小灯草点位
*   校准了部分点位

10/02

*   更新了星螺点位
*   校准了部分点位与图片

10/01

*   更新了部分宝箱，添加了部分清心、马尾、莲蓬点位，更新了先遣队、盗宝团（璃月）、骗骗花、蒙德大型丘丘人、蒙德深渊法师、蒙德遗迹守卫点位
*   实装了点位导入功能

9/29

*   更新了部分宝箱，添加了蒙德骗骗花和幼岩龙蜥

9/28

*   更新了点聚合功能
*   实装了宝箱已完成数量提示
*   优化了部分UI体验

9/27

*   再次更新了一大波宝箱点位
*   校准了部分琉璃袋点位及配图

9/26

*   更新了一大波宝箱点位

9/25

*   更新了点击点位的弹窗样式，现在可以点击隐藏图片了，没有图片的点位不会显示？图片了

9/22

*   更新了琉璃袋、琉璃百合及部分璃月宝箱点位

9/20

*   更新了部分宝箱位置和图片

9/19

*   更新了新版筛选器
*   放大了神瞳，优化了点位样式，现在已获取的物品显示更明显了，校准了岩神瞳位置并更新了岩神瞳图片信息

9/15

*   更新了地图底图到正式服，更新了风神瞳、岩神瞳点位到正式服

9/14

*   修复了一些BUG，PC端现在默认开启筛选器了。

9/09

*   重制了筛选器样式，优化了网页源码
*   添加了璃月宝箱
*   添加了宝箱图片
*   添加了标记功能

7/17

*   添加、删除了部分璃月精英怪位置，添加了蒙德宝箱位置

7/07

*   更新璃月精英怪位置，给图标加上了边框

6/30

*   更新最后一个岩神瞳位置

6/29

*   更新蒙德水晶矿、蒙德白铁矿位置

6/28

*   更新璃月水晶矿、璃月白铁矿位置

6/23

*   更新钩钩果、嘟嘟莲、落落梅、风车菊、塞西莉亚花、慕风蘑菇、蒲公英籽、夜泊石、石珀位置

6/20

*   优化网页代码，更新菜单样式

6/18

*   更新绝云椒椒、霓裳花、琉璃百合位置

6/16

*   更新蒙德、璃月全20个地灵龛位置

**感谢你看到了最后😁~**</content>

  <content>January 29, 2025

【网页版】更新日志
---------

**Hi，这里是原神地图网页版的更新日志(o゜▽゜)o☆**

**大家对原神地图的各种反馈和建议，我们都有一一记下，并且持续跟进。以下是原神地图的功能更新记录，快来看看有没有你关心的吧——**

**如果你喜欢这个地图，可以[捐助](https://yuanshen.site/docs/support-us.html)[我们](https://yuanshen.site/docs/support-us.html)~**

_**【2022年地图网页版更新内容】**_ [​](#【2022年地图网页版更新内容】)
---------------------------------------------

*   更新了一大波宝箱点位

9/25

*   更新了点击点位的弹窗样式，现在可以点击隐藏图片了，没有图片的点位不会显示？图片了

9/22

*   更新了琉璃袋、琉璃百合及部分璃月宝箱点位

9/20

*   更新了部分宝箱位置和图片

9/19

*   更新了新版筛选器
*   放大了神瞳，优化了点位样式，现在已获取的物品显示更明显了，校准了岩神瞳位置并更新了岩神瞳图片信息

9/15

*   更新了地图底图到正式服，更新了风神瞳、岩神瞳点位到正式服

9/14

*   修复了一些BUG，PC端现在默认开启筛选器了。

9/09

*   重制了筛选器样式，优化了网页源码
*   添加了璃月宝箱
*   添加了宝箱图片
*   添加了标记功能

7/17

*   添加、删除了部分璃月精英怪位置，添加了蒙德宝箱位置

7/07

*   更新璃月精英怪位置，给图标加上了边框

6/30

*   更新最后一个岩神瞳位置

6/29

*   更新蒙德水晶矿、蒙德白铁矿位置

6/28

*   更新璃月水晶矿、璃月白铁矿位置

6/23

*   更新钩钩果、嘟嘟莲、落落梅、风车菊、塞西莉亚花、慕风蘑菇、蒲公英籽、夜泊石、石珀位置

6/20

*   优化网页代码，更新菜单样式

6/18

*   更新绝云椒椒、霓裳花、琉璃百合位置

6/16

*   更新蒙德、璃月全20个地灵龛位置

**感谢你看到了最后😁~**</content>
</page>

  <title>VitePress | Kongying TavernGitHubXYouTubeBilibiliRedditGitee</title>
  <url>https://yuanshen.site/docs/en/blog/IBHSAQ</url>
  <content>January 29, 2025

【客户端】更新日志
---------

> **客户端下载方式（除了自动更新外的方式）**
>
> *   夸克云盘：[https://pan.quark.cn/s/fe8bb34c77bc](https://pan.quark.cn/s/fe8bb34c77bc)
> *   加入讨论组： [https://yuanshen.site/docs/community.html](https://yuanshen.site/docs/community.html)
> *   百度网盘（提取码：KYJG）：[https://pan.baidu.com/s/1t\_FRadAiGHGxw1YvvWt0bg](https://pan.baidu.com/s/1t_FRadAiGHGxw1YvvWt0bg)
> *   天翼云盘（访问码：exn0）：[https://cloud.189.cn/t/YF7Fj2zIRVbi](https://cloud.189.cn/t/YF7Fj2zIRVbi)
> *   若没有出现自动更新窗口，请尝试：[https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs-more/?id=102055](https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs-more/?id=102055)

**Rc1.0.1：2025-01-15**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致无法通过快捷键返回游戏
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致无法开启窗口置顶

**Rc1.0.0：2025-01-14**

*   更新了引擎版本到2021.3.20f1c1
*   更改了基础框架，现在使用了YooAsset+HybridCLR实现热更新，以实现长期支持
*   优化了整体流畅度
*   可能新增了一堆BUG
*   **注意此版本无法通过更新器更新，请重新下载完整包**

* * *

**beta5.2.4：2024-12-4**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致双击地区地图切换空白
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致追踪下载解压错误从而导致无法运行
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致存档错误以至于程序无法退出
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致首次使用追踪快捷键开启追踪显示的永远是关闭
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致在搜索其他地区物品时切换地图显示文本与物品重叠
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致开机页面缩放错误
*   新增了已标记点位仅中键点击（即已标记点位锁定）开关
*   分离了UI缩放与地图缩放，并增加了放大的区间
*   优化了缩放ui时的底图元素的显示隐藏逻辑

**beta5.2.3：2024-12-1**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致刷新时间格式错误从而导致物品0/0
*   优化了UI缩放以适配竖屏模式
*   重构了UI缩放逻辑，现在调整UI缩放会同时缩放地图元素

**beta5.2.2：2024-11-24**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致登录错误从而导致物品0/0
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致点位关联状态时点击同关联点位后再点击其他点位时点位异常消失
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致快捷键UI无法点击且动画错误
*   优化了分层模式当前层级的点位标签颜色，现在跟游戏中一致
*   优化了无图标的【?】图标样式
*   添加了浮羽之湾地区文本

**beta5.2.1：2024-11-20**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致新环境无法使用
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致在地区多选模式并且显示非当前地图点位模式下聚焦非当前地图物品后取消当前地图的选择，筛选器会全是非当前地图物品

**beta5.2：2024-11-20**

*   更新了5.2地图及资源
*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致存档功能异常
*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致脱机模式功能异常
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致点位弹窗文本框大小异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致登录时音效异常突然炸裂
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致2.8群岛切换岛屿失效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致在点位弹窗打开时关闭物品会导致点位位于最上层
*   新增了清除所有已选物品的二次确认弹窗
*   新增了物品预设功能
*   新增了物品搜索功能
*   新增了多选地区功能
*   新增了显示非当前地图物品功能
*   新增了物品聚焦功能
*   新增了专注物品功能
*   新增了物品右键菜单
*   新增了地区右键聚焦功能
*   新增了开始界面的国际化选项
*   新增了开始界面的音效开关
*   优化了已选物品栏判断
*   优化了鼠标提示，现在鼠标提示若相同仅会刷新持续时间
*   优化了所有滚动组件的执行效率
*   优化了地区选择、类型选择、物品选择的UI动画表现
*   优化了滚动窗口效率，现在无论多少物品也不会卡了
*   优化了数据结构以优化效率
*   优化了GC调用以优化效率
*   优化了地图切换时的特效表现
*   优化了点击ui镜头缩放的表现
*   优化了物品进度条的UI表现
*   修改了设置界面UI逻辑
*   修改了洞口判断逻辑
*   新增了一堆BUG特性

**beta5.0.2：2024-9-23**

*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致点位关联类型失效从而导致物品状态刷新失败进而导致物品413/812
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致地下地区自动选择失效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致地区筛选排序异常
*   新增了有向关联、有向路径、双向路径的关联类型
*   新增了位置追踪的Windows图形设置按钮方便关闭窗口化游戏优化

**beta5.0.1：2024-8-28**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致某些分层的点位显隐状态不正确
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致DLL版本翻译未生效

**beta5.0：2024-8-28**

*   更新了5.0地图及资源
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致资源版本号为-1
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致详情弹窗的滚动条不能拖动
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致切换语言时某些文本不立即生效
*   优化了国际化语言重新选择逻辑
*   优化了图片对webp的支持
*   优化了切换物品类型时候的效果

**beta4.8：2024-7-17**

*   更新了4.8地图及资源

**beta4.7.2：2024-6-25**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致取消点位会取消多次以至于点位直接消失
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致第一次打开洞口点位洞口会受到透明度影响

**beta4.7.1：2024-6-17**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致数据读取异常因而413/812

**beta4.7：2024-6-17**

*   更新了部分底图文本
*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致打开覆盖模式强制关闭程序再次打开时程序无法操作
*   优化了已选物品栏目，现在同名物品会被合并了
*   优化了国际化语言自动选择逻辑

**beta4.6.3：2024-5-4**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致开启自动切换地下地区时无法打开某些点位弹窗
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致无法点击点位弹窗中的关闭按钮来关闭点位弹窗

**beta4.6.2：2024-5-1**

*   更新了旧日之海自动追踪
*   更新了部分地下地区底图
*   更新了部分底图文本位置
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致状态还原还原出同名的其他物品
*   新增了一个**史诗级**功能——自动切换地下地区，开启该功能时点击点位会自动切换到对应地下/地上层级
*   添加了地上时关闭洞口的功能开关
*   优化了存档回溯功能，添加了数据清洗和日期选择，现在应该不会因为数据太多卡死了
*   优化了鼠标事件，现在鼠标中键（滚轮键）也能点开poi详情了，因此可以在画布编辑时按中键打开poi详情了

**beta4.6.1：2024-4-24**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致蒙德龙脊雪山变成了琉形蜃境

**beta4.6：2024-4-24**

*   更新了4.6地图及资源
*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致版本更新服务器崩溃时，无法开启位置追踪
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致开启追踪时音效卡顿
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致极个别物品数据异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致地下区域自动打开洞口功能失效
*   新增了一个**神话级**功能——点位关联，该功能可将解密起点与终点点位相连，方便快速跟与标记踪点位；在设置中添加了点位关联的相关设置项，关联可设置自动触发而无需多次标记
*   优化了部分网页链接跳转地址
*   优化了点位在地图缩放较大时的表现

**beta4.4.4：2024-2-27**

*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致无法下载自动追踪模块
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致覆盖模式在游戏内设置全屏无边框时覆盖错误
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致连续三次下载重试后进入脱机模式和退出的按钮无效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致自动追踪模块检测更新无效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致提示窗口文本与框体脱离
*   优化了覆盖模式版本选择的UI，现在会将已经下载的版本做标记了
*   优化了部分长文本UI的提示

**beta4.4.3：2024-2-22**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致点击公告出现的公告不是所点击的公告
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致重置物品在已经开启过的物品但是处于隐藏状态下的重置失效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致数量为0/0的物品不显示
*   添加了已标记点位透明度的设置滑条
*   添加了自体自身之塔开关
*   添加了隐藏的传送点透明度的设置滑条
*   添加了沉玉谷地下地图文本
*   添加了地下地图和已标记点位的快捷键设置（默认为空）
*   添加了宝箱计数条
*   添加了大部分滚动条的聚焦显示tip
*   优化了公告系统，添加了一个入口，现在支持超链接了
*   优化了字体材质，现在更加清晰了
*   优化了点位弹窗，将图片固定到外部，并优化了文本滚动逻辑，现在可以左键点击拖拽文本了

**beta4.4.2：2024-1-31**

*   更新了4.4地图及资源
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新异常

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致矿物刷新时间异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致有两个枫丹地区

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致地下洞口显隐异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致矿物刷新时间异常

*   更新了3.8地图及资源

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致游戏全屏时无法按键返回游戏

*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致覆盖模式回到游戏鼠标会异常没被游戏捕获
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致覆盖模式地图未正常消失
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新后某些传送点异常存在于其他地图
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新后数据更新弹窗未正常关闭

**beta3.6.1：2023-04-15**

*   更新了须弥苍漠囿土地下区域及部分雨林地下区域
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致未登录时有些物品会出现413/812的奇怪数值
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致全屏模式退出重进会变成非全屏
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致甘露花海文字未显示
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致荼泥黑渊图层不是最终版
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致覆盖模式的一系列前置问题及后置问题
*   移除自动神瞳功能
*   添加了清除追踪缓存的配置项

**beta3.6：2023-04-12**

*   更新了须弥苍漠囿土地区及资源
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致非提瓦特地区的边界特效显示错误
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致切换地区的边界特效显示层级错误

*   更新了安装器

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新后地下地上点位透明度无法切换
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致底图字体描边失效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致传送点位的标记状态无法保存
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致自动追踪下载框关闭后再下载会重新下载
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致清空下载缓存后再次下载完成动画会出错
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致下载中途退出后重新下载数据显示负数
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致神瞳的popup窗口比其他的大
*   优化了筛选项重置逻辑
*   优化了边界特效shader

*   修复了一个**传说级**bug，该bug曾导致点击点位弹出popup时若不等待图片加载完成就关闭popup会卡成ppt（并没有完全修好，下次一定

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致大伟丘在数据上存在自动刷新时间
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致网络状态不佳时无法退出程序
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致进入隐藏模式后，如在群岛地区退出隐藏模式，此时无法选择其他地图区域
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致初始化时传送点位的显示状态可能有问题
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致popup在加载图片时文字显示不全
*   新增了自动刷新的开关配置项
*   优化了标记的延迟，现在标记会瞬间完成，即使你的网络不通也会瞬间完成

*   修复了一个**传说级**bug，该bug曾导致运行一段时间后卡成PPT（并没有修好，下次一定

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致筛选器自动展开模式下切换地区有时候会自动收回

*   优化了渲染效率

*   金苹果群岛更新
*   代码逻辑重构
*   修复了大量bug
*   新增了大量特性
*   大幅优化了程序流畅度，现在轻松满载不卡顿了！
*   优化了后台使用率，现在即便不开后台暂停，程序进入后台也不会占用大量GPU了！
*   尝试修复了自动追踪的C++报错！

*   从蒙德拆离了龙脊雪山为一个新地区！
*   现在一些点位会属于多个物品了！标记一个等于标记所有！
*   现在启动速度提升了200%！加载点位更是提升1000%瞬间完成！

*   新增了大量bug

**beta2.6.1：2022-04-03**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致第一次打开客户端无法选择地区
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致无法自动更新
*   添加了客户端请求数量到200w次

**beta2.6：2022-03-11**

*   代码上添加了意想不到的新东西
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致双击点击开始会发生初始化异常错误!!（并没有修好，下次一定（又修好了，如果没好请运行更新器手动更新一下））!!
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致一直处于获取服务器版本失败状态无法进入，现在点重试会更换资源服务器并重试
*   已知**稀有级**bug，该bug导致该版本无法运行自动更新，请手动更新~

**beta2.5：2022-02-16**

*   更新稻妻第五部分（三界路飨祭）地图及资源
*   更新鹤观自动追踪
*   添加资源热跟新逻辑!!（同时添加了大量未知bug）!!
*   也许修复了存档被顶替的bug
*   优化了图片资源显示模式
*   优化了加载界面
*   细节处理了一些UI

**beta2.4：2022-01-05**

*   更新稻妻第四部分（渊下宫）地图及资源
*   添加了全地图截图功能
*   添加了大量的鼠标提示与鼠标提示显示开关
*   添加了画板编辑ui，改善了画板操作体验
*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致画线功能画好后重开会导致某些线段蜜汁消失
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致筛选项没有正常被还原以至于操作卡顿
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致画线功能删除点时产生异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致画线的线出现错误log输出
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致画板出现错误log输出
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致画板处添加画布文字不显示
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致框选时松开ctrl右键会标记滑过的物品
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致蒙德地区突发委托及世界任务标记后显示异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致某特殊状态下无法加载地图
*   优化了点击空地图的效果，现在不会生成一个不明所以的点击框了
*   优化了画线功能，现在编辑线条新线段时点击poi点位会将poi坐标传入线条
*   优化了已选物品的显示，现在鼠标移上去才会显示删除图标
*   优化了地区选择的大小，使其更易点击
*   优化了翻译系统，现在将自动更新翻译
*   优化了地图资源以增加流畅度
*   在语言选择处添加了翻译率

**beta2.3：摸了摸了**

**beta2.2：2021-10-13**

*   更新稻妻第三部分（鹤观）地图及资源
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致世界语（Esperanto）字体错误

**beta2.1.3：2021-09-10**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致程序最小化时托盘无法正常唤出程序
*   优化了地图数据更新，现在检测到数据更新会自动弹窗提示
*   优化了筛选器自动展开，现在鼠标移出程序后一段时间将自动收回
*   优化了地区选择逻辑，应该不会出现找不到稻妻2的情况了。。。
*   优化了更新器更新失败时的弹窗提示，现在它更优雅了

**beta2.1.2：2021-09-03**

*   更新了稻妻2的自动追踪
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致切换应用程序（alt+tab）时会出现悬浮窗的小窗口
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致悬浮窗异常闪烁不定及alt+m关闭地图过后一定时间地图会异常再次弹出
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致查看点位视频被穿透导致点到下方的点位

[← Back To Blog](https://yuanshen.site/docs/en/blog/)</content>
</page>

  <content>2025年1月29日

【客户端】更新日志
---------

> **客户端下载方式（除了自动更新外的方式）**
>
> *   夸克云盘：[https://pan.quark.cn/s/fe8bb34c77bc](https://pan.quark.cn/s/fe8bb34c77bc)
> *   加入讨论组： [https://yuanshen.site/docs/community.html](https://yuanshen.site/docs/community.html)
> *   百度网盘（提取码：KYJG）：[https://pan.baidu.com/s/1t\_FRadAiGHGxw1YvvWt0bg](https://pan.baidu.com/s/1t_FRadAiGHGxw1YvvWt0bg)
> *   天翼云盘（访问码：exn0）：[https://cloud.189.cn/t/YF7Fj2zIRVbi](https://cloud.189.cn/t/YF7Fj2zIRVbi)
> *   若没有出现自动更新窗口，请尝试：[https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs-more/?id=102055](https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs-more/?id=102055)

**Rc1.0.1：2025-01-15**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致无法通过快捷键返回游戏
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致无法开启窗口置顶

**Rc1.0.0：2025-01-14**

*   更新了引擎版本到2021.3.20f1c1
*   更改了基础框架，现在使用了YooAsset+HybridCLR实现热更新，以实现长期支持
*   优化了整体流畅度
*   可能新增了一堆BUG
*   **注意此版本无法通过更新器更新，请重新下载完整包**

* * *

**beta5.2.4：2024-12-4**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致双击地区地图切换空白
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致追踪下载解压错误从而导致无法运行
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致存档错误以至于程序无法退出
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致首次使用追踪快捷键开启追踪显示的永远是关闭
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致在搜索其他地区物品时切换地图显示文本与物品重叠
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致开机页面缩放错误
*   新增了已标记点位仅中键点击（即已标记点位锁定）开关
*   分离了UI缩放与地图缩放，并增加了放大的区间
*   优化了缩放ui时的底图元素的显示隐藏逻辑

**beta5.2.3：2024-12-1**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致刷新时间格式错误从而导致物品0/0
*   优化了UI缩放以适配竖屏模式
*   重构了UI缩放逻辑，现在调整UI缩放会同时缩放地图元素

**beta5.2.2：2024-11-24**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致登录错误从而导致物品0/0
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致点位关联状态时点击同关联点位后再点击其他点位时点位异常消失
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致快捷键UI无法点击且动画错误
*   优化了分层模式当前层级的点位标签颜色，现在跟游戏中一致
*   优化了无图标的【?】图标样式
*   添加了浮羽之湾地区文本

**beta5.2.1：2024-11-20**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致新环境无法使用
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致在地区多选模式并且显示非当前地图点位模式下聚焦非当前地图物品后取消当前地图的选择，筛选器会全是非当前地图物品

**beta5.2：2024-11-20**

*   更新了5.2地图及资源
*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致存档功能异常
*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致脱机模式功能异常
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致点位弹窗文本框大小异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致登录时音效异常突然炸裂
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致2.8群岛切换岛屿失效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致在点位弹窗打开时关闭物品会导致点位位于最上层
*   新增了清除所有已选物品的二次确认弹窗
*   新增了物品预设功能
*   新增了物品搜索功能
*   新增了多选地区功能
*   新增了显示非当前地图物品功能
*   新增了物品聚焦功能
*   新增了专注物品功能
*   新增了物品右键菜单
*   新增了地区右键聚焦功能
*   新增了开始界面的国际化选项
*   新增了开始界面的音效开关
*   优化了已选物品栏判断
*   优化了鼠标提示，现在鼠标提示若相同仅会刷新持续时间
*   优化了所有滚动组件的执行效率
*   优化了地区选择、类型选择、物品选择的UI动画表现
*   优化了滚动窗口效率，现在无论多少物品也不会卡了
*   优化了数据结构以优化效率
*   优化了GC调用以优化效率
*   优化了地图切换时的特效表现
*   优化了点击ui镜头缩放的表现
*   优化了物品进度条的UI表现
*   修改了设置界面UI逻辑
*   修改了洞口判断逻辑
*   新增了一堆BUG特性

**beta5.0.2：2024-9-23**

*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致点位关联类型失效从而导致物品状态刷新失败进而导致物品413/812
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致地下地区自动选择失效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致地区筛选排序异常
*   新增了有向关联、有向路径、双向路径的关联类型
*   新增了位置追踪的Windows图形设置按钮方便关闭窗口化游戏优化

**beta5.0.1：2024-8-28**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致某些分层的点位显隐状态不正确
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致DLL版本翻译未生效

**beta5.0：2024-8-28**

*   更新了5.0地图及资源
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致资源版本号为-1
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致详情弹窗的滚动条不能拖动
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致切换语言时某些文本不立即生效
*   优化了国际化语言重新选择逻辑
*   优化了图片对webp的支持
*   优化了切换物品类型时候的效果

**beta4.8：2024-7-17**

*   更新了4.8地图及资源

**beta4.7.2：2024-6-25**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致取消点位会取消多次以至于点位直接消失
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致第一次打开洞口点位洞口会受到透明度影响

**beta4.7.1：2024-6-17**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致数据读取异常因而413/812

**beta4.7：2024-6-17**

*   更新了部分底图文本
*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致打开覆盖模式强制关闭程序再次打开时程序无法操作
*   优化了已选物品栏目，现在同名物品会被合并了
*   优化了国际化语言自动选择逻辑

**beta4.6.3：2024-5-4**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致开启自动切换地下地区时无法打开某些点位弹窗
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致无法点击点位弹窗中的关闭按钮来关闭点位弹窗

**beta4.6.2：2024-5-1**

*   更新了旧日之海自动追踪
*   更新了部分地下地区底图
*   更新了部分底图文本位置
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致状态还原还原出同名的其他物品
*   新增了一个**史诗级**功能——自动切换地下地区，开启该功能时点击点位会自动切换到对应地下/地上层级
*   添加了地上时关闭洞口的功能开关
*   优化了存档回溯功能，添加了数据清洗和日期选择，现在应该不会因为数据太多卡死了
*   优化了鼠标事件，现在鼠标中键（滚轮键）也能点开poi详情了，因此可以在画布编辑时按中键打开poi详情了

**beta4.6.1：2024-4-24**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致蒙德龙脊雪山变成了琉形蜃境

**beta4.6：2024-4-24**

*   更新了4.6地图及资源
*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致版本更新服务器崩溃时，无法开启位置追踪
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致开启追踪时音效卡顿
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致极个别物品数据异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致地下区域自动打开洞口功能失效
*   新增了一个**神话级**功能——点位关联，该功能可将解密起点与终点点位相连，方便快速跟与标记踪点位；在设置中添加了点位关联的相关设置项，关联可设置自动触发而无需多次标记
*   优化了部分网页链接跳转地址
*   优化了点位在地图缩放较大时的表现

**beta4.4.4：2024-2-27**

*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致无法下载自动追踪模块
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致覆盖模式在游戏内设置全屏无边框时覆盖错误
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致连续三次下载重试后进入脱机模式和退出的按钮无效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致自动追踪模块检测更新无效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致提示窗口文本与框体脱离
*   优化了覆盖模式版本选择的UI，现在会将已经下载的版本做标记了
*   优化了部分长文本UI的提示

**beta4.4.3：2024-2-22**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致点击公告出现的公告不是所点击的公告
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致重置物品在已经开启过的物品但是处于隐藏状态下的重置失效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致数量为0/0的物品不显示
*   添加了已标记点位透明度的设置滑条
*   添加了自体自身之塔开关
*   添加了隐藏的传送点透明度的设置滑条
*   添加了沉玉谷地下地图文本
*   添加了地下地图和已标记点位的快捷键设置（默认为空）
*   添加了宝箱计数条
*   添加了大部分滚动条的聚焦显示tip
*   优化了公告系统，添加了一个入口，现在支持超链接了
*   优化了字体材质，现在更加清晰了
*   优化了点位弹窗，将图片固定到外部，并优化了文本滚动逻辑，现在可以左键点击拖拽文本了

**beta4.4.2：2024-1-31**

*   更新了4.4地图及资源
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新异常

*   更新了4.4地图及资源

**beta4.4：2024-1-31**

*   更新了4.4地图及资源
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致标记传送点位后对应id的其他点位未同时被标记
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致传送点位在被标记后处于地下地区打开状态不会被正确透明化
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致点击点位误触传送点位

*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致登录或退出登录时物品选择状态未被正确还原，同时导致地下区域自动打开地下洞口功能关闭时重启地图地下洞口会被自动打开。

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新时会卡死

*   优化了地下层级切换按钮的大小缩放
*   优化了地下地区点位筛选，现在点位可以根据地下层级进行筛选了
*   优化了自动追踪版本切换逻辑

*   更新了4.1地图及资源
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致设置界面某些语言文本溢出

**beta4.0.2：2023-09-12**

*   后端更新，适配版本，此版本之前将无法进入
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致山中洞窟·二层位置偏移
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致枫丹地区没有浪船锚点
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致雨林两处旧版地下地区层级不正确
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致某些点位被标记后会立即刷新!!（不知道修没修好）!!

**beta4.0.1：2023-08-18**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致某些物品无法正常显隐
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致矿物刷新时间异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致有两个枫丹地区

**beta4.0：2023-08-16**

*   更新了4.0地图及资源
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致宝箱及物品同时存在的item在重启地图自动打开后反选物品中的物品会直接让点位消失，即使宝箱品质是被选中的状态
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致地下洞口显隐异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致矿物刷新时间异常

**beta3.8.1：2023-07-08**

*   更新了3.8地图的自动追踪
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新会卡0kb/s
*   添加了关闭时的自动保存提示

*   更新了3.8地图及资源

**beta3.6.4：2023-04-18**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致日语地名显示异常

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致游戏全屏时无法按键返回游戏

**beta3.6.2：2023-04-16**

*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致覆盖模式回到游戏鼠标会异常没被游戏捕获
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致覆盖模式地图未正常消失
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新后某些传送点异常存在于其他地图
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新后数据更新弹窗未正常关闭
*   优化了热更资源下载逻辑，以大幅减小后续更新包大小
*   添加了返回游戏的快捷键配置项

*   更新了须弥苍漠囿土地下区域及部分雨林地下区域
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致未登录时有些物品会出现413/812的奇怪数值
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致全屏模式退出重进会变成非全屏
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致甘露花海文字未显示
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致荼泥黑渊图层不是最终版
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致覆盖模式的一系列前置问题及后置问题
*   移除自动神瞳功能
*   添加了清除追踪缓存的配置项

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致底图字体描边失效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致传送点位的标记状态无法保存

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致清空下载缓存后再次下载完成动画会出错
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致下载中途退出后重新下载数据显示负数

*   优化了边界特效shader

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致网络状态不佳时无法退出程序
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致进入隐藏模式后，如在群岛地区退出隐藏模式，此时无法选择其他地图区域
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致初始化时传送点位的显示状态可能有问题
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致popup在加载图片时文字显示不全

*   优化了标记的延迟，现在标记会瞬间完成，即使你的网络不通也会瞬间完成

*   修复了一个**传说级**bug，该bug曾导致运行一段时间后卡成PPT（并没有修好，下次一定

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致筛选器自动展开模式下切换地区有时候会自动收回
*   新增了存档回溯，云端与本地独立回溯

*   新增了自主设置是否显示未选择的分层的配置项

*   优化了渲染效率

*   添加了自动追踪DLL版本号显示

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致地图移动未完成时鼠标立即移出视野地图会立即停止
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致显示/隐藏点位状态错误

*   修复了alt+m会导致鼠标异常到桌面点击的问题（也许修复了，不确定）

**beta3.0.2：2022-09-06**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致自动追踪区域外的箭头视角缩放后大小错误
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致第一次的登录的自动存档不会复制本地存档的错误，现在新建存档会询问是否复制未登录时的本地存档
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致某些设备自动追踪不能（修复了，还不行请尝试更新显卡驱动然后重启客户端）
*   优化了自动追踪，现在2560\*1080的带鱼屏也可追踪了
*   优化了隐藏已标记点位的按钮文本可读性
*   优化了滚动条的滚动速度

*   更新了全地区的自动追踪，包括须弥地区、地下矿区和渊下宫！（仅测试过1920\*1080）
*   优化了点位更新的取消时间，现在间隔时间将指数级上升
*   优化了存档覆盖弹窗的可读性

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致计数错误

**beta2.9: 咕咕咕**

**beta2.8：2022-07-23**

*   **注意！**该版本之前的版本也许无法正常自动更新到该版本，若遇到此bug请手动下载更新！
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致网页版本更换到客户端无法同步物品信息
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致截图功能异常
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致无法自动更新
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新无法更新图片和文本
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致翻译某部分文本未生效
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致点位视频按钮不会显示
*   优化了点位存储的id信息，统一为使用新id
*   将某一神秘bug修改为新特性！现在pop窗口可以被滚轮缩放了！

**beta2.7.5：2022-07-20**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致启动后切换地图不进行类型选择时进行数据更新可能会导致物品选项错误
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致点位自动刷新后面板的数量统计错误地没有被减少
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新后切换地区后切换翻译导致翻译错乱
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新无法更新出新的物品选项
*   优化了群岛的4个岛屿的选中特效
*   添加了四个岛屿的点击可切换的鼠标提示
*   添加了未处于岛屿正确形态的点位的鼠标提示
*   **该版本有无法自动更新的bug，请手动进行版本更新！** 2.7.3以前自动更新上来或者一直都是覆盖安装的就没有此bug

**beta2.7.4：2022-07-19**

*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致某些不同语言体系的系统的点位出现位置异常
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致受网络影响群岛的某些点位可能不会显示
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新后异常卡死（与2.7.2的该bug相同但触发位置不同）
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致日语的底图文字为白框
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致切换地区翻译错乱
*   优化了下载数据的逻辑，现在会进行重试至多5次
*   **该版本有无法自动更新的bug，请手动进行版本更新！** 2.7.3以前自动更新上来或者一直都是覆盖安装的就没有此bug

**beta2.7.3：2022-07-17**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致启动后不切换地图进行数据更新可能会导致物品选项错误
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致数据更新后异常卡死

**beta2.7.2：2022-07-16**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致先切换岛屿形态，再筛选宝箱，此时该岛屿形态下的宝箱不会高亮
*   自动追踪dll切回旧版，等待测试通过再次更新

**beta2.7.1：2022-07-15**

*   又修复了大量bug

**beta2.7：2022-07-15**

*   金苹果群岛更新
*   代码逻辑重构
*   修复了大量bug
*   新增了大量特性
*   大幅优化了程序流畅度，现在轻松满载不卡顿了！
*   优化了后台使用率，现在即便不开后台暂停，程序进入后台也不会占用大量GPU了！
*   尝试修复了自动追踪的C++报错！
*   现在宝箱的种类和打开方式可以同时选择了！
*   从蒙德拆离了龙脊雪山为一个新地区！
*   现在一些点位会属于多个物品了！标记一个等于标记所有！
*   现在启动速度提升了200%！加载点位更是提升1000%瞬间完成！
*   现在启动时会欲岩又止了！
*   新增了大量bug

**beta2.6.1：2022-04-03**

*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致第一次打开客户端无法选择地区
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致无法自动更新
*   添加了客户端请求数量到200w次

**beta2.6：2022-03-11**

*   代码上添加了意想不到的新东西
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致双击点击开始会发生初始化异常错误!!（并没有修好，下次一定（又修好了，如果没好请运行更新器手动更新一下））!!
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致一直处于获取服务器版本失败状态无法进入，现在点重试会更换资源服务器并重试
*   已知**稀有级**bug，该bug导致该版本无法运行自动更新，请手动更新~

**beta2.5：2022-02-16**

*   更新稻妻第五部分（三界路飨祭）地图及资源
*   更新鹤观自动追踪
*   添加资源热跟新逻辑!!（同时添加了大量未知bug）!!
*   也许修复了存档被顶替的bug
*   优化了图片资源显示模式
*   优化了加载界面
*   细节处理了一些UI

**beta2.4：2022-01-05**

*   更新稻妻第四部分（渊下宫）地图及资源
*   添加了全地图截图功能
*   添加了大量的鼠标提示与鼠标提示显示开关
*   添加了画板编辑ui，改善了画板操作体验
*   修复了一个**史诗级**bug，该bug曾导致画线功能画好后重开会导致某些线段蜜汁消失
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致筛选项没有正常被还原以至于操作卡顿
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致画线功能删除点时产生异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致画线的线出现错误log输出
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致画板出现错误log输出
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致画板处添加画布文字不显示
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致框选时松开ctrl右键会标记滑过的物品
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致蒙德地区突发委托及世界任务标记后显示异常
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致某特殊状态下无法加载地图
*   优化了点击空地图的效果，现在不会生成一个不明所以的点击框了
*   优化了画线功能，现在编辑线条新线段时点击poi点位会将poi坐标传入线条
*   优化了已选物品的显示，现在鼠标移上去才会显示删除图标
*   优化了地区选择的大小，使其更易点击
*   优化了翻译系统，现在将自动更新翻译
*   优化了地图资源以增加流畅度
*   在语言选择处添加了翻译率

**beta2.3：摸了摸了**

**beta2.2：2021-10-13**

*   更新稻妻第三部分（鹤观）地图及资源
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致世界语（Esperanto）字体错误

**beta2.1.3：2021-09-10**

*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致程序最小化时托盘无法正常唤出程序
*   优化了地图数据更新，现在检测到数据更新会自动弹窗提示
*   优化了筛选器自动展开，现在鼠标移出程序后一段时间将自动收回
*   优化了地区选择逻辑，应该不会出现找不到稻妻2的情况了。。。
*   优化了更新器更新失败时的弹窗提示，现在它更优雅了

**beta2.1.2：2021-09-03**

*   更新了稻妻2的自动追踪
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致切换应用程序（alt+tab）时会出现悬浮窗的小窗口
*   修复了一个**稀有级**bug，该bug曾导致悬浮窗异常闪烁不定及alt+m关闭地图过后一定时间地图会异常再次弹出
*   修复了一个**普通级**bug，该bug曾导致查看点位视频被穿透导致点到下方的点位

[← ブログに戻る](https://yuanshen.site/docs/ja/blog/)</content>
</page>

  <title>支持我们 | 空荧酒馆GitHubXYouTubeBilibiliRedditGitee</title>
  <url>https://yuanshen.site/docs/support-us.html</url>
  <content>原神地图是采用 MulanPSL-1.0 许可的开源项目，使用完全零广告并且完全免费。 但是随着项目规模和用户数量的持续增长，也需要有相应的资金支持才能持续项目的维护和开发。你可以通过下列的方法来支持原神地图的开发与维护：

一次性赞助 [​](#一次性赞助)
-----------------

我们通过以下方式接受一次性赞助：

[微信支付](#wechatpay "微信支付") [支付宝](#alipay "支付宝") [QQ 支付](#qqpay "QQ 支付") [PayPal](#paypal "PayPal") [bilibili](#bilibili "bilibili")

赞助鸣谢 [​](#sponsor-acknowledgement)
----------------------------------

### 个人赞助 [​](#个人赞助)

Backers

INFO

出于篇幅和更新难度考虑，当前此处仅展示**2023年之前**在爱赞助、微信、支付宝渠道赞助的部分小伙伴。23年后赞助的以及之前在哔哩哔哩充电、PayPal、QQ Pay、ETC、BTC 渠道赞助的暂未更新。还请谅解(´◡\`)

### 赞助商 [​](#赞助商)

请致信 [yuanshenmap@gmail.com](mailto:yuanshenmap@gmail.com) 咨询具体事宜。

如果你是企业经营者那么赞助原神地图可以帮助你在原神地图社区里获得更高的曝光度，从而更容易地吸引到原神玩家。

如果你是旅行者并且享受地图带来的高效率，可以用捐助来表示你的谢意 —— 就好像偶尔给我们买杯快乐水或者护发素 😃

TIP

未成年人请勿大额赞助如有其他疑问可联系网站管理者 QQ：790489566，并备注相关问题。</content>
